name: Parallel Palace - Quake
description:
Parallel Palace is a multiplayer deathmatch map that can be played on any modern Quake launcher (e.g Quakespasm). It supports between 2-6 players and features most of Quake's weapons/powerups. This was made for a level design assignment in which we I was given a random adjective+noun prompt and instructed to create a multiplayer map with that prompt in mind.

Made using Trenchbroom.
